result.eng: The smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ga: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.orig: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.html: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad an t-ualaċ atá uirṫi is sásta a ḃíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.

result.eng: That's right but they won't believe us.
result.ga: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muid
result.orig: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muid
result.html: Is fíor sin ach ní chreidfidh siad muidThat's right but they won't believe us.
result.ponchtml: Is fíor sin aċ ní ċreidfiḋ siad muidThat's right but they won't believe us.

result.eng: That's no help.
result.ga: Ní aon chabhair é
result.orig: Ní aon chabhair é
result.html: Ní aon chabhair éThat's no help.
result.ponchtml: Ní aon ċaḃair éThat's no help.

result.eng: That's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ga: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde
result.orig: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde
result.html: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairdeThat's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ponchtml: Sin deireaḋ leis an scéal a ċairdeThat's the end of the story, my friends.

result.eng: That's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ga: Sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir
result.orig: Sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir
result.html: Sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoirThat's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ponchtml: Sin rud naċ ḃfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoirThat's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.

result.eng: That's the same person.
result.ga: Sin é an duine céanna
result.orig: Sin é an duine céanna
result.html: Sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.
result.ponchtml: Sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.

result.eng: That's human nature.
result.ga: Sin é an nádúr daonna
result.orig: Sin é an nádúr daonna
result.html: Sin é an nádúr daonnaThat's human nature.
result.ponchtml: Sin é an nádúr daonnaThat's human nature.

result.eng: That's the whole story.
result.ga: Sin é an scéal uile
result.orig: Sin é an scéal uile
result.html: Sin é an scéal uileThat's the whole story.
result.ponchtml: Sin é an scéal uileThat's the whole story.

result.eng: That's a shame.
result.ga: Is mór an trua sin
result.orig: Is mór an trua sin
result.html: Is mór an trua sinThat's a shame.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an trua sinThat's a shame.

result.eng: Now, that's three euros ten cents total, please.
result.ga: Anois sin trí euro deich cent ar fad le do thoil
result.orig: Anois sin trí euro deich cent ar fad le do thoil
result.html: Anois sin trí euro deich cent ar fad le do thoilNow, that's three euros ten cents total, please.
result.ponchtml: Anois sin trí euro deiċ cent ar fad le do ṫoilNow, that's three euros ten cents total, please.

result.eng: That's none of your business!
result.ga: Ní bhaineann sin leat
result.orig: Ní bhaineann sin leat
result.html: Ní bhaineann sin leatThat's none of your business!
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃaineann sin leatThat's none of your business!

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ga: Sin Úna sin Niamh Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.orig: Sin Úna sin Niamh Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireadh
result.html: Sin Úna sin Niamh Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireadh[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.
result.ponchtml: Sin Úna sin Niaṁ Ansin Muiris tá seisean i lár báire Ansin Fiona agus mise ar deireaḋ[Looking at a family photo:] That's Úna, that's Niamh. Then Muiris, he is in the middle. Then Fiona; and myself at the end.

result.eng: Do you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
result.ga: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid
result.orig: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid

result.ponchtml: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní ḃím Corrċluiċe púil sa bpub sin an méidDo you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.

result.eng: That's great!
result.ga: Tá sé sin go hiontach
result.orig: Tá sé sin go hiontach
result.html: Tá sé sin go hiontachThat's great!
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin go hiontaċThat's great!

result.eng: That's very bold!
result.ga: Tá sé sin an-dána
result.orig: Tá sé sin an-dána
result.html: Tá sé sin an-dánaThat's very bold!
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin an-dánaThat's very bold!

result.eng: That's not too early.
result.ga: Níl sé sin róluath
result.orig: Níl sé sin róluath
result.html: Níl sé sin róluathThat's not too early.
result.ponchtml: Níl sé sin róluaṫThat's not too early.

result.eng: If that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.
result.ga: Má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí é
result.orig: Má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí é
result.html: Má bhí sé sin sa chinniúint di dhéanfadh sí éIf that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃí sé sin sa ċinniúint di ḋéanfaḋ sí éIf that's what fate had in store for her, she'd do it.

result.eng: Now now, that's enough talking.
result.ga: Seo seo tá go leor canta
result.orig: Seo seo tá go leor canta
result.html: Seo seo tá go leor cantaNow now, that's enough talking.
result.ponchtml: Seo seo tá go leor cantaNow now, that's enough talking.

result.eng: That's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ga: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.orig: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.html: Sin an rud a thug an bealach méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ponchtml: Sin an rud a ṫug an bealaċ méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.

result.eng: That's where the school master was lodging.
result.ga: B'ann a bhí máistir na scoile ar ceathrúin
result.orig: B'ann a bhí máistir na scoile ar ceathrúin
result.html: B'ann a bhí máistir na scoile ar ceathrúinThat's where the school master was lodging.
result.ponchtml: B'ann a ḃí máistir na scoile ar ceaṫrúinThat's where the school master was lodging.

result.eng: That's where they would discuss current affairs.
result.ga: B'ann a chardáiltí gnoithe na hÉireann

result.html: B'ann a chardáiltí gnoithe na hÉireannThat's where they would discuss current affairs.

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.orig: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.html: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.

result.eng: That's why I am crying.
result.ga: Sin fáth mo chaointe
result.orig: Sin fáth mo chaointe
result.html: Sin fáth mo chaointeThat's why I am crying.
result.ponchtml: Sin fáṫ mo ċaointeThat's why I am crying.

result.eng: Well, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
result.ga: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag di
result.orig: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag di
result.html: Bhail sin an seachtú haithne agat is déan a mhór nó a bheag diWell, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃail sin an seaċtú haiṫne agat is déan a ṁór nó a ḃeag diWell, that's the seventh commandment for you, whatever you think of it.

result.eng: That's why I came here.
